title: Glottography dataset derived from Suttles and Suttles 1985 "Native languages of the northwest coast"
description: This dataset provides non-overlapping, traditional ranges of Native languages of the American northwest coast as depicted in the map by Suttles and Suttles 1985.
citation: Suttles, Wayne & Cameron Suttles. 1985. Native languages of the northwest coast. The Press of the Oregon Historical Society.
